content:
Szia!

Sajnos csak úgy nem lehet módosítani a gyorsbillentyűket. Viszont van jó hírem is, ez feltehetőleg egy fordítási hiba volt, legalábbis ez alapján ezt feltételezem: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1845460. Javítottam a Pontoonon (ez a Mozilla lokalizációs platformja), a következő kiadásban már ismét Ctrl+Shift+Q lesz a gyorsbillentyűje.

Üdv, Balázs

content:
I have a .ws email address and gmail just lets them fall off a cliff somewhere. Same address will deliver to outlook and elsewhere no problem.

I have tried the process to say that it's a good address to no avail. It seems that you can add a line to your email sending server so that gmail can certify it's legit.

What extension is on your email that fails?

btw it's along the lines of: Make sure messages you sent are authenticated using DKIM (preferred) or SPF.

content: I have asked the support at the provider of the mail server if the domain sunhill.nu could cause the problem. No answer yet. I tried the DKIM but the problem remains.

content: I got answer from the provider that the SPF setting for the domain was missing. Problem solved. Thanks for your help.

content: I am not familiar with the AVG for business product or how your business setup looks like as far as email is concerned. Do those emails even make it into the server-side Inbox? I would first took into your server-side setup. Those emails could be getting intercepted (as suspicious) and placed in a special server-side folder awaiting your review before they end up in the Inbox, while they don't outright end up in the Junk folder.
creator: stancestans

content: Thank you for your quick response. I will look into it. I can't see any evidence of them so have contacted our internet service provider to see if they can help me.
creator: anna92

content:
re :I am having trouble with Thunderbird not receiving some emails.

You have not mentioned whether you are using a Pop or Imap mail account in Thunderbird.

If you have set up a Pop mail account then it can only download emails which are in the server Inbox. You would need to logon to the webmail account and check to see if emails have been sent to the server 'Spam' folder.

re:internet service provider

You may have an email address provided by your ISP; most people do. But is the problem email address one provided by your ISP or is it provided by a webhost or a free service like gmail.

Are the emails appearing in the webmail account? Are you using a Pop account? What server does the mail account use?
creator: Toad-Hall

content: Thanks for responding. I have spoken to our internet service provider and it seems that the messages were being blocked by the server.

content:
Dipende dal formato in cui sono salvate le email.

Se sono archivi mbox di Thunderbird puoi seguire questa guida -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/questions/1411211#answer-1576316 (ma solo per Thunderbird fino alla versione 102) saltando la parte sull'individuazione del profilo.

Se sono file in formato eml le puoi trascinare direttamente dal disco esterno ad una delle cartelle interne di Thunderbird. Se sono molte, fai l'operazione a blocchi di 100/200 email per volta

creator: Mark2090

content:
Hello there We have read the message. We try to help you


The timestamps that appear on an email come from two places: the time settings on the email server and the time settings on your laptop or PC. to this comes the season setting the current time and also the times also states, for example, the time zones.

if these do not work properly and there is one that does not play correctly, the entire system will show an incorrect image for this.

Greetings firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird.

content:
Hello there

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/customize-date-time-formats-thunderbird


if a closer look at the operation of Thunderbird and the settings should be taken then you will have to read the supplied form.


Greetings
creator: Googlethunderbird.

content:
Hello there caruni We have read the message We try to help you.

The popups are used in various places on the Internet or on the desktop and in programs. Your image is created in conjunction with your graphics card.

There are settings for use in all of these places where you work with the computer.

So think carefully if you want to block it why you want this


Greetings firefox volunteer.
creator: Googlethunderbird.

content:
Hello there


Open Google_Chrome on your computer. Click on the settings in the top right.

Click Privacy and Security Site Settings.

Pop-ups and redirects.

Select the desired option as the default setting.
creator: Googlethunderbird.

content:
Why do you write about Google Chrome or browser? It is about Thunderbird or am I in the wrong forum? Maybe you missunderstood me?

BUT I found the solution, how to disable the tooltips that appear in THUNDERBIRD.

In Version 115 is not "browser.chrome.toolbar_tipps -> false" BUT "browser.chrome.toolbar_tips -> false".

Just for the case, someone also is looking for this solution.
creator: caruni

content:
Hello there.


Most toolbars can be shown or hidden. while you are working with thunderbird.

hiding and or displaying it, you can use your mouse wired or wireless to find an empty area of ​​the tabs on your PC or laptop or device at the top.

and use the popup window that soon appeared clearly on your screen to start using the functions regarding on or off.


Greetings firefox volunteer

creator: pcp04

content:
Si, te confirmo que estoy viendo ese mismo problema. Soy soporte técnico en una empresa y los Eventos enviados desde Thunderbird 115 (supernova) se ven con 1 hora menos en Outlook 2019. Sin embargo, se ven bien en Outlook 365, o al recibirlo en cuentas Google, o en otro Thunderbird.

Por lo que veo, en supernova el formato del archivo invite.ics que se envía como invitación al evento es mucho mas complejo:

Este es el invite.ics de versiones anteriores:

BEGIN:VCALENDAR PRODID:-//Mozilla.org/NONSGML Mozilla Calendar V1.1//EN VERSION:2.0 METHOD:REPLY BEGIN:VTIMEZONE TZID:America/Argentina/Buenos_Aires BEGIN:STANDARD TZOFFSETFROM:-0300 TZOFFSETTO:-0300 TZNAME:-03 DTSTART:19700101T000000 END:STANDARD END:VTIMEZONE BEGIN:VEVENT CREATED:20221103T172659Z LAST-MODIFIED:20221104T123001Z DTSTAMP:20221104T123001Z UID:03a53c98-c394-453e-a2e3-a8ac9a50479a SUMMARY:Vacaciones ORGANIZER;PARTSTAT=NEEDS-ACTION;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT:mailto:xxxx@xxxx.com ATTENDEE;CN=Participante;PARTSTAT=ACCEPTED;ROLE=REQ-PARTICIPANT: 

mailto:xxxxx@xxxx.com

Mientras que este es el invite.ics de supernova lo pongo en el siguiente mensaje, porque acá ya no entra.

content:
Hello there We have read the message. We try to help you.

To begin customizing the fonts for message content, open Preferences/Display/Format/Advanced and there you can make changes to your chosen fonts and writing systems the add-on sc&tf is also a good add-on for your question, with this you expand your menu bars, etc. This is available in the Thunderbird add-on site.


Greetings
creator: Googlethunderbird.

content: I cannot find anything like "sc&tf" at the Thunderbird Add-on site (https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/), please help. Thanks!
creator: zenobia1

content:
Hello there


go to the options for tools) settings) general) and find the necessary configuration editor - to run these settings and search there for the line layout.css.devPixelsPerPx

you may encounter certain risk conditions along the way click here yes if you are convinced to do this.

first type in the word pixels if you search via the search bar, you can also get to the relevant topic in this way.

once present at these options you will be prompted to change the values. from e.g. 0 to a further number is possible.

watch out for the ceiling.


Greetings firefox volunteer

content: you probably had a message on your desktop screen. to restore your settings to utf_8. are these set to these values? if i may ask?
creator: Googlethunderbird.

content:
If you are referring to the display fonts in composed and received messages, try this:

Settings/General/Language & Appearance, Fonts & Colours, Advanced..., set the fonts and sizes with Fonts for: Latin and repeat with Fonts for: Other Writing Systems, uncheck 'Allow messages to use other fonts'.
creator: sfhowes

content:
.Indeed, some settings for html and character settings and character types formatting for this can cause confusion among users of these.

The management topics are divided into three types

The display the image

Sending(composing messages.) And the user s interface.

For you this looks like an incorrect calculation or setting in your user interface and/or menu bar.

It will work out for the good if you perform the above actions that in the previously written post of above .(sfhowes)

There are also certain redirects for HTML use per message .

Greetings.
creator: Googlethunderbird.

content: Thunderbird just updated and the font type in the email received/correspondent/date list block is horrible. I want to change it. Is this possible ? I can adjust the size in the view menu, but there doesn't seem to be a setting for font type.
creator: doej79779

content: Check to see if you have an alternate 'reply to' address. It may be that it is incorrect and some email clients are replying to it instead of the primary 'reply to' address.
creator: davidsk

content: See the All Mail section here: http://kb.mozillazine.org/Gmail
